items.rationale: Baseline hero message retained for U.S. audiences.
complianceNotes: No region-specific disclaimers required in hero headline.

items.baselineText: StitchFlow orchestrates translation, copy, and UX updates across regions so your team can preview, approve, and ship localized web experiences in record time.
items.proposedText: StitchFlow orchestrates translation, copy, and UX updates across regions so your team can preview, approve, and ship localized web experiences in record time.
items.rationale: Baseline positioning statement for U.S. audiences.
complianceNotes: References localisation velocity benefits without quantitative promises.

items.baselineText: Localizing digital journeys is more than translation—teams need alignment on tone, imagery, accessibility, and regional compliance. StitchFlow threads each workflow together with human-in-the-loop checkpoints and granular change logs.
items.proposedText: Localizing digital journeys is more than translation—teams need alignment on tone, imagery, accessibility, and regional compliance. StitchFlow threads each workflow together with human-in-the-loop checkpoints and granular change logs.
items.rationale: Baseline narrative on localisation complexity for U.S. teams.
complianceNotes: Highlights accessibility expectations (Section 508) noted in locale brief.

items.baselineText: Request a tailored walkthrough for your localization program.
items.proposedText: Request a tailored walkthrough for your localization program.
items.rationale: Baseline CTA copy supporting demo request.
complianceNotes: Uses “program” to match U.S. spelling norms.

items.rationale: Baseline button label encouraging demo request.
complianceNotes: Button label aligns with baseline product messaging.

items.rationale: Emphasises multi-market readiness and keeps tone confident while aligning with UK marketing language preferences.
complianceNotes: Aligns with Equality Act guidance by focusing on inclusive language.

items.baselineText: StitchFlow orchestrates translation, copy, and UX updates across regions so your team can preview, approve, and ship localized web experiences in record time.
items.proposedText: StitchFlow orchestrates translation, copy, and UX updates across regions so your team can preview, approve, and ship localised web experiences without slowing delivery programmes.
items.rationale: Uses British spellings and directly addresses programme delivery expectations common in UK organisations.
complianceNotes: Mentions delivery programmes—a key procurement consideration noted in locale brief.

items.baselineText: Localizing digital journeys is more than translation—teams need alignment on tone, imagery, accessibility, and regional compliance. StitchFlow threads each workflow together with human-in-the-loop checkpoints and granular change logs.
items.proposedText: Localising digital journeys is more than translation—teams need alignment on tone, imagery, accessibility, and regional compliance. StitchFlow threads each workflow together with human-in-the-loop checkpoints and granular change logs tailored for UK governance.
items.rationale: Switches to British spelling and explicitly nods to UK governance expectations surfaced in the brief.
complianceNotes: References governance without naming specific regulations, avoiding legal overreach.

items.baselineText: Request a tailored walkthrough for your localization program.
items.proposedText: Request a tailored walkthrough for your localisation programme.
items.rationale: Adapts to UK spelling and references “programme” to match procurement language.
complianceNotes: Keeps call-to-action compliant with UK marketing standards (CAP Code).

items.rationale: Switches to UK-preferred verb (“Book”) and British spelling for localisation.
complianceNotes: Encourages booking language common in UK marketing flows.

items.proposedText: すべての市場を自信を持ってローンチしましょう
items.rationale: Provides an encouraging call-to-action in polite Japanese, emphasising partnership and momentum.
complianceNotes: Avoids specific performance claims to remain conservative for Japanese regulations.

items.baselineText: StitchFlow orchestrates translation, copy, and UX updates across regions so your team can preview, approve, and ship localized web experiences in record time.
items.proposedText: StitchFlowは翻訳、コピー、UXの更新を一つのワークフローにまとめ、チームがキャンバス上でレビューして承認し、迅速にローカライズ版をリリースできるよう支援します。
items.rationale: Explains the orchestrated workflow in formal Japanese (丁寧語) while highlighting shared review visibility.
complianceNotes: Keeps claims qualitative to respect APPI advertising guidance.

items.baselineText: Localizing digital journeys is more than translation—teams need alignment on tone, imagery, accessibility, and regional compliance. StitchFlow threads each workflow together with human-in-the-loop checkpoints and granular change logs.
items.proposedText: デジタル体験のローカライズは単なる翻訳ではありません。トーンやビジュアル、アクセシビリティ、地域のコンプライアンスまで整合させる必要があります。StitchFlowは各ワークフローをヒューマンチェックと詳細なチェンジログでつなげます。
items.rationale: Provides a succinct explanation aligned to Japanese consensus-building norms and highlights auditability.
complianceNotes: Mentionsコンプライアンス (compliance) consistent with brief guidance from METI and APPI.

items.baselineText: Request a tailored walkthrough for your localization program.
items.proposedText: 貴社のローカライゼーション計画に合わせたウォークスルーをご依頼ください。
items.rationale: Uses polite request language and emphasises tailoring to the customer’s localisation framework.
complianceNotes: Formality level aligns with expectations for B2B marketing content in Japan.

items.proposedText: ローカライズ済みデモを依頼
items.rationale: Direct imperative phrasing commonly used in Japanese enterprise CTAs.
complianceNotes: Avoids guarantee phrasing, consistent with APPI marketing guidance.
